title: BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask– 60 Pcs - Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles Treatments – Look Younger and Reduce Wrinkles and Fine Lines Undereye, Improve and Firm eye Skin - Pure Natural Material Extraction
descriptions:
BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask — gentle care for tired eyes.

What it does:
- Helps reduce puffiness and dark circles.
- Softens fine lines and wrinkles.
- Keeps the skin under your eyes moist and firm.
- Makes you look more refreshed and awake.

What’s inside:
- Aloe Vera to soothe and hydrate.
- Collagen to support skin strength and elasticity.
- Made from pure, natural ingredients.

What you get:
- 60 easy-to-use eye masks.
- Non-slip design so they stay in place.
- Quick, time-saving routine.

How to use (simple steps):
1) Wash your face and the area around your eyes with warm water.
2) Place one pad under each eye. Press gently so it sticks.
3) Relax for 20 minutes. Sit or lie down comfortably.
4) Remove the pads. Gently pat in any leftover liquid.

How often:
- Use twice a day if you can, or at least once a day.

Helpful tips:
- Use on clean, dry skin.
- If your skin feels irritated, stop using and consult a doctor.
- Keep out of reach of children.

With regular use, your eye area can look smoother, brighter, and well-hydrated—without hassle.
